title: The Best Chocolate Chocolate Chip Bundt CakeJessMaria LichtyLianneFredaFredaLeanne WolfLynne
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. and spray bundt cake pan generously with cooking spray.

Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl, stir to combine until well combined. Transfer to bundt pan, spreading evenly. Bake for 40-50 minutes or until baked through. Remove and let cool completely before flipping over.
Dust with powdered sugar and cut into slices.
ingredients: 3.4 ounce package instant vanilla or chocolate pudding mix
